title: FileWave
description: Developed a Cloud Storage System using the MERN Stack, ensuring scalability, security, and following best practices.
achievements: Optimized data storage and retrieval for high performance.
Followed industry best practices for code quality and security.

title: EduLearn Platform
description: Created an e-Learning platform for online courses with features for course creation, management, and student interaction.
achievements: Developed a comprehensive admin panel for course and user management.
Integrated real-time chat and video conferencing features.
Implemented a responsive design for seamless access across devices.

title: Eventify
description: Built an event management application for organizing, tracking, and managing events with real-time updates.
achievements: Developed a real-time notification system for event updates.
Integrated third-party APIs for payment and location services.
Ensured cross-platform compatibility with mobile and desktop interfaces.

title: ShopMate
description: Designed an e-commerce platform with a focus on user experience, inventory management, and secure transactions.
achievements: Implemented advanced search and filtering options for products.
Integrated a secure payment gateway and order tracking system.
Optimized site performance with lazy loading and efficient caching strategies.
